pages.text: $(thing)Crucial 2$() comes with several new $(item)Advancements$() to help give you new challenges.$(br2)Make sure to click on the $(item)Advancements$() button in the pause menu to check it out!$(br2)Also, you can now see what things are missing for advancements with multiple requirements by holding $(thing)Shift$().

On the left of the window, you'll also see a selection of buttons. These are $(item)Titles$(). Once you complete their linked advancements, you can click one, and it'll show under your name in multiplayer for other players!
